text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product specification information.

Product specification:
ProSticker 306 (One) 4" Patriot Series Thank You Blue Who Protect and Serve Thin Blue Line Support Decal Sticker

Product keywords:
Indoor/Outdoor decals 
Made with outdoor professional grade vinyl and UV resistant inks.
Contoured cut to the shape of the image for a clean and custom look.
Uniquely designed by our national award winning artist to look good on any colored background.
Can be applied to most smooth surfaces including vehicles, laptops, windows, tool boxes, etc.
Instructions included for easy application. All orders ship the same or next business day.
Bulk Quantities and Custom Orders are our specialty.
 Be assured all of our sales are "Square & on the Level" Your satisfaction is guaranteed.

Product description:
text.Response A: Show your support for the men and women who protect and serve with this "Thank You Blue" decal sticker. With its unique design and professional grade vinyl, this sticker is built to last. It can be applied to most smooth surfaces, including vehicles, laptops, windows, and tool boxes. All of our sales are "Square & on the Level" and your satisfaction is guaranteed. Add this decal to your collection today!
text.Response B: This 4" Patriot Series Thank You Blue Who Protect and Serve Thin Blue Line Support Decal Sticker is uniquely designed by our national award-winning artist to look good on any colored background. Made with outdoor professional-grade vinyl and UV resistant inks. All of our stickers are contour cut to the shape of the image for a clean and custom look. It can be applied to most smooth surfaces including vehicles, laptops, windows, tool boxes, etc. Our indoor/outdoor decals are suitable for car windows, bumpers, laptops, walls, lockers, folders, and any other place you can think of. All of our stickers are "Square & on the Level". All orders ship the same or next business day.

meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

775.displayed_text:
Prompt

You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product specification information.

Product specification:
ProSticker 306 (One) 4" Patriot Series Thank You Blue Who Protect and Serve Thin Blue Line Support Decal Sticker

Product keywords:
Indoor/Outdoor decals
Made with outdoor professional grade vinyl and UV resistant inks.
Contoured cut to the shape of the image for a clean and custom look.
Uniquely designed by our national award winning artist to look good on any colored background.
Can be applied to most smooth surfaces including vehicles, laptops, windows, tool boxes, etc.
Instructions included for easy application. All orders ship the same or next business day.
Bulk Quantities and Custom Orders are our specialty.
Be assured all of our sales are "Square & on the Level" Your satisfaction is guaranteed.

Product description:

Response A

Show your support for the men and women who protect and serve with this "Thank You Blue" decal sticker. With its unique design and professional grade vinyl, this sticker is built to last. It can be applied to most smooth surfaces, including vehicles, laptops, windows, and tool boxes. All of our sales are "Square & on the Level" and your satisfaction is guaranteed. Add this decal to your collection today!

Response B

This 4" Patriot Series Thank You Blue Who Protect and Serve Thin Blue Line Support Decal Sticker is uniquely designed by our national award-winning artist to look good on any colored background. Made with outdoor professional-grade vinyl and UV resistant inks. All of our stickers are contour cut to the shape of the image for a clean and custom look. It can be applied to most smooth surfaces including vehicles, laptops, windows, tool boxes, etc. Our indoor/outdoor decals are suitable for car windows, bumpers, laptops, walls, lockers, folders, and any other place you can think of. All of our stickers are "Square & on the Level". All orders ship the same or next business day.
